resources.string: " We here at Spruce love what we do. This is start up company started by a passionate woman \'Mary Shalin\' whose only goal is to provide solution to all your event management related problems. We know it\'s difficult for you manage an event with so many people around you with different requirements. We are a team of 20 working around the clock to provide you solutions and assist you in every possible way. "

" All you have to do is, select an event of your choice and we will list out different requirements that you will need for the event. As per your order we will make arrangements. You do not have to run errands in the last minute. We got you! Our team of volunteers will work on ground at the requested event location (or the one\'s we pick for you..yes, we do that too!!). All you need to do is login, select the type of event and give requirements as per the listing. You can cutomize the event settings, fix a date and pay. Voila !! All set to have a memorable event that you can cherish forever along with us. Come and join and get various discounts and benifits by becoming a member of our family. "
Click here To Enjoy Our Services
Hi member ! Welcome Back. Login In

We know how hard it is to conduct a Wedding party. That\'s why we are here for you to help out with your wedding party plans and arrange everything for you. Once you select the required items below, we will be able to provide you with the services you need on time. Go ahead and keep selecting!
Do you require a wedding cake
Select number of volunteers for hire
"Thank you for the Reservation! Your Booking has been confirmed. Your total amount is dollars.You can pay on the day of service. "
"Having problems? Reach out to us by email 'spruce@gmail.com' "
